biography.summary: John Cornyn is an American attorney and politician serving as the senior United States Senator from Texas. A Republican, he has served in the Senate since 2002 and has held leadership roles including Senate Majority and Minority Whip.
biography.education: Undergraduate degree from Trinity University; J.D. from the University of Virginia School of Law.
